org.fcrepo.server.security.jaas.auth

Class AuthHttpServletRequestWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
        • org.fcrepo.server.security.jaas.auth.AuthHttpServletRequestWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.ServletRequest

    public class AuthHttpServletRequestWrapper
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
    This class wraps a standard HttpServletRequest and adds the ability to set roles and principals.
    Author:
    nish.naidoo@gmail.com
